item.title: 首次公开募股失败后，CoreWeave 正在洽谈 15 亿美元债务交易
item.description: 据一位知情人士透露，在大幅缩减首次公开募股规模后，CoreWeave Inc.【原文：After a heavily scaled down initial public offering, CoreWeave Inc. is in discussions to raise about $1.5 billion in debt, according to a person with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 集团称美英贸易协定对英国乙醇行业是灾难性的
item.description: 一个行业组织警告说，英国与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普达成的贸易协议将给英国乙醇行业带来 "灾难性 "后果，因为免关税进口威胁到当地生产商的生存。【原文：The UK trade deal struck with US President Donald Trump will have “disastrous” consequences for Britain’s ethanol sector as tariff-free imports threaten local producers’ existence, an industry group warned.】

item.title: 巴西航空公司 Gol 在增资提案提出后跌至历史最低点
item.description: Gol Linhas Aereas Inteligentes SA 的股价周五跌至历史最低点，因为这家巴西航空公司提出增资 192 亿雷亚尔（约合 34 亿美元），以求退出破产保护程序。【原文：Gol Linhas Aereas Inteligentes SA’s stock slumped to a record low on Friday after the Brazilian airline proposed a 19.2 billion reais ($3.4 billion) capital increase in its latest attempt to exit Chapter 11.】

item.title: 美联储主席巴金称并非所有企业都能因关税而提价
item.description: 里士满联邦储备银行行长汤姆-巴金（Tom Barkin）表示，企业不一定能通过提高价格来抵消关税成本，他警告说，消费者在经历多年通胀后的承受能力有限。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Richmond President Tom Barkin said it’s not a given that companies can raise their prices to offset the cost of tariffs, warning that consumers’ tolerance after years of inflation is only so high.】

item.title: 太阳能充斥电网，法国电价跌至零以下
item.description: 由于本周末太阳能发电量将压倒电网，法国日前电力自去年 7 月以来首次跌破零点。【原文：French day-ahead power tumbled below zero for the first time since July last year as solar generation this weekend is set to overwhelm the grid.】

item.title: 美国股市开盘上涨，投资者期待中国会谈
item.description: 美国股市周五开盘走高，交易商权衡了美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的言论，他表示对中国征收 80% 的关税似乎是正确的，而此时两国之间的谈判正定于周六开始。【原文：US stocks opened higher Friday as traders weighed comments from President Donald Trump suggesting that an 80% tariff on China seemed right, just as negotiations between the two countries are set to begin on Saturday.】

item.title: 特朗普的首个贸易协定让人对交易的艺术略知一二
item.description: 对于正在思考如何与唐纳德-特朗普谈判的全球领导人来说，美国总统与英国签订的就职协议提供了一些线索，说明他准备让步多少。【原文：For global leaders puzzling over how to negotiate with Donald Trump, the US president’s inaugural pact with the UK offers a few clues on how much ground he’s prepared to give.】

item.title: 永明资产管理和美国业绩强劲，超出预期
item.description: 在资产管理部门的推动下，永明金融公司第一季度业绩超出分析师预期。【原文：Sun Life Financial Inc. beat analyst expectations in the first quarter, fueled by its asset management segment.】

item.title: 印度证券监管机构推行高于预期的持仓限额
item.description: 据熟悉讨论情况的人士透露，印度证券监管机构的一个小组建议采用一种新的方法来计算未平仓期权和期货的价值，并提高持仓限额。【原文：A panel of India’s securities regulator has recommended a new way of calculating the value of options and futures outstanding and increasing position limits, according to people familiar with the discussions.】

item.title: 匈牙利反对欧盟制裁卢克石油迪拜分公司的提议
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，匈牙利对欧盟制裁俄罗斯石油巨头卢克石油公司（Lukoil PJSC）在迪拜的贸易公司 Litasco Middle East DMCC 的提议表示反对。【原文：Hungary raised objections to a European Union proposal to sanction Litasco Middle East DMCC, a Dubai-based trading unit of Russian oil giant Lukoil PJSC, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 阿根廷阿尔巴内西公用事业公司在未支付债券后与债权人接洽
item.description: 阿根廷公用事业公司阿尔巴内西集团（Grupo Albanesi）的两家子公司在六个月前发行的美元债券未获偿付后，向债权人伸出了援手。【原文：Two subsidiaries of Argentina’s utility Grupo Albanesi have reached out to creditors after missing a payment on dollar bonds it issued just six months ago.】

item.title: 纽约联储计划定期提供提前回购操作
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行计划将关键流动性工具的提前清算操作纳入常规日程，以加强该工具并支持市场平稳运行。【原文：The Federal Reserve Bank of New York plans on making early-settlement operations for a key liquidity facility part of the regular schedule in a bid to enhance the tool and support smooth market functioning.】

item.title: 关税打击制造业，加拿大失业率跃升至 6.9
item.description: 加拿大上个月创造就业的步伐不温不火，使失业率飙升至 11 月份的水平，这是自 2017 年 1 月以来除大流行病之外的最高水平。【原文：Canada’s tepid pace of job creation last month sent the unemployment rate soaring back to a level last seen in November, the highest since January 2017 outside of the pandemic.】

item.title: 美联储威廉姆斯称锚定通胀预期至关重要
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行行长约翰-威廉姆斯（John Williams）表示，将通胀预期保持在政策制定者的目标附近是中央银行的 "基石"。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of New York President John Williams said keeping inflation expectations anchored near policymakers’ target forms the “bedrock” of central banking.】

item.title: 美国调查 CrowdStrike 老板在 Carahsoft 交易中的作用
item.description: 据两位熟悉此事的人士透露，美国检察官和监管机构正在调查 CrowdStrike Holdings Inc.【原文：US prosecutors and regulators investigating a $32 million deal between CrowdStrike Holdings Inc. and a technology distributor are probing what senior company executives may have known about it and are examining other transactions made by the cybersecurity firm, according to two people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 华尔街为 ETF 大众带来比特币与黄金的冲突
item.description: 比特币狂热者和黄金狂热者之间的文化冲突即将在交易所交易基金领域上演。【原文：The culture clash between Bitcoin enthusiasts and gold bugs is about to be played out in the world of exchange-traded funds.】

item.title: 库格勒称美联储有时间在美国经济健康时保持耐心
item.description: 美联储理事阿德里安娜-库格勒（Adriana Kugler）表示，政策制定者应暂时保持利率稳定，并指出美国经济稳定以及唐纳德-特朗普总统关税政策的不确定性。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Adriana Kugler said policymakers should hold interest rates steady for now, pointing to a stable US economy and uncertainty around President Donald Trump’s tariffs policy.】

item.title: 央行加息周期接近尾声，巴西通胀趋缓
item.description: 在巴西央行提高利率并表示其紧缩周期接近尾声几天后公布的一份报告中，巴西上个月的年度通货膨胀率大致与预测一致。【原文：Brazil’s annual inflation picked up roughly in line with forecasts last month, in a report published days after the central bank lifted the interest rate and indicated it was nearing the end of its tightening cycle.】

item.title: 随着丑闻的消退，富国银行对纽约分行制定了大计划
item.description: 在富国银行位于纽约市的最新分行内，离中央公园只有几步之遥，查理-沙尔夫（Charlie Scharf）正在谈论将其银行网络扩展到整个大苹果地区的计划。【原文：Inside Wells Fargo & Co.’s newest branch in New York City, steps from Central Park, Charlie Scharf was talking up plans to expand his bank’s network across the Big Apple.】

item.title: 苹果设备管理先驱 Jamf 将向安卓系统拓展
item.description: Jamf Holding Corp. 以帮助企业管理和保护苹果公司设备而闻名，该公司将开始为安卓用户提供移动管理服务。【原文：Jamf Holding Corp., best known for helping businesses manage and secure Apple Inc. devices, will begin offering mobile management services for Android users.】

item.title: 美国绿色喷气燃料生产仍在等待起飞
item.description:
这对地球和农民都有好处，但可持续航空燃料却难以在特朗普政府的推动下获得发展。【原文：

It’s good for the planet and good for farmers, yet sustainable aviation fuel is struggling to gain momentum with the Trump administration.

】

item.title: Sarepta 公司本周因 FDA 担忧和前景下调而每况愈下
item.description: Sarepta Therapeutics 公司将迎来四年来最糟糕的一周，因为令人失望的收益和监管担忧打击了这家制药商的股价。【原文：Sarepta Therapeutics Inc. is on pace for its worst week in four years as disappointing earnings and regulatory fears hit the drugmaker’s shares.】

item.title: 投资激增，花旗集团寻求在纳米比亚和贝宁开展业务
item.description: 花旗集团正在与纳米比亚和贝宁等非洲国家政府进行谈判，以促进投资流入这些国家。【原文：Citigroup Inc. is in talks with African governments including Namibia and Benin to boost business as investment flows into the countries.】

item.title: 特朗普称在谈判前对中国征收 80% 的关税 "似乎是正确的
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普在周六即将开始的谈判前提出对中国征收 80% 的关税，并敦促中国政府采取更多措施向美国商品开放市场。【原文：US President Donald Trump floated an 80% tariff on China ahead of negotiations due to begin Saturday as he urged Beijing to do more to open their markets to US goods.】

item.title: 英国统计局局长在关键经济数据不被信任的情况下下台
item.description: 在英国官方经济数据遭遇信任危机之际，英国国家统计局局长已经下台。【原文：The leader of Britain’s national statistics agency has stepped down amid a crisis of confidence in the country’s official economic data.】

item.title: 韦丹塔赞比亚铜业公司利用人民币帮助举债
item.description: 韦丹塔资源有限公司（Vedanta Resources Ltd. ）的赞比亚铜矿开采部门已聘请兰德商业银行（Rand Merchant Bank）帮助筹集多达 10 亿美元的债务融资，用于扩大其在赞比亚的业务。【原文：Vedanta Resources Ltd.’s Zambian copper mining unit has hired Rand Merchant Bank to help raise as much as $1 billion in debt financing for the expansion of its operations in the country.】

item.title: 几内亚采取行动取消违规公司的采矿权
item.description: 几内亚过渡时期总统马马迪-杜姆布亚（Mamadi Doumbouya）将军指示其政府撤销那些不遵守对国家的法律承诺的采矿公司的许可证和特许权。【原文：Guinea’s transitional President General Mamadi Doumbouya instructed his government to withdraw permits and concessions from mining companies that don’t respect their legal commitments to the country.】

item.title: 加拿大航空公司下调 2025 年展望，原因是前往美国城市的旅行减少
item.description: 加拿大航空公司下调了 2025 年的利润预期，原因是唐纳德-特朗普总统的贸易战导致经济放缓，并阻碍了一些加拿大人前往美国旅行。【原文：Air Canada trimmed its profit forecast for 2025 as President Donald Trump’s trade war slows the economy and discourages some Canadians from traveling to the US.】
